Create data frame for Latin square design

Source: R/utils_design.R
df.lsd.Rd

Create data frame for Latin square design

Usage

df.lsd(treatments, squares = 1, reuse = c("row", "col", "both"))

Arguments

treatments

a vector representing the number of levels of treatment factors sequentially. For example, treatments=c(2,3) specifies two treatment factors with 2 and 3 levels, respectively.

squares

number of replicated squares

reuse

a character string: "row", "col", or "both", indicating reuse of rows or columns or both when replicate a Latin square

Value

a data.frame with columns for treatment factors, row and column block factors, and squares

Examples

df.lsd(5, 3)
#>    row col treatment square
#> 1    1   1         2      1
#> 2    2   1         3      1
#> 3    3   1         4      1
#> 4    4   1         5      1
#> 5    5   1         1      1
#> 6    1   2         3      1
#> 7    2   2         4      1
#> 8    3   2         5      1
#> 9    4   2         1      1
#> 10   5   2         2      1
#> 11   1   3         4      1
#> 12   2   3         5      1
#> 13   3   3         1      1
#> 14   4   3         2      1
#> 15   5   3         3      1
#> 16   1   4         5      1
#> 17   2   4         1      1
